actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the exclusion from gross income of a certain portion of amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits by individuals who have attained age 65.
short_title: Tax Relief for Elderly Pensioners Act

summary.text: Tax Relief for Elderly Pensioners Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of individuals aged 65 or older up to $9,600 ($12,800 for joint returns) of amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits.

titles.title: Tax Relief for Elderly Pensioners Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the exclusion from gross income of a certain portion of amounts received as annuities, pensions, or other retirement benefits by individuals who have attained age 65.
